name: Total Recoil (itch) (Ckjrckjr)
description:
Don't be stunned like vegetable!! Recoil Rivals is a 2d local multiplayer battle arena game for you and your friends to become vegetables that are fighting to escape their destiny of being cooked!

Make use of the power of recoil to move around!

This game requires controllers to play, but you can have one player using the keyboard and mouse. Supports up to 4 players.

Opening Instructions:  Unzip the zip file, open "Build" folder, and double-click on "Recoil Rivals.exe". Select your quality and windowed settings and you are good to go!

Playing Instructions: For controllers, use left analog stick to aim, right trigger to shoot primary weapon, B to shoot secondary weapon, start button to start/pause. For keyboard and mouse, space key to start/pause, left click to shoot primary weapon, right click to shoot secondary weapon, and mouse to aim.

Version: The game is still in alpha. There will be bug-fixes now and then.

This game is made for a game design module in NUS, Singapore.
